name: I HATE BUGS! (banninghamma)
description:
I HATE BUGS! is a modified version of a 3D first-person shooter base game from Michigan State University's Game Design and Development 2: 3D Shooter course.

You are dropped into a space forest infested with space bugs. Shoot those bugs, grab keys, find escape portal and get the heck outta there!

What I add from the base game:

  • 2 new levels.
  • Adding new terrains with trees, grass and new skyboxes.
  • Adding post-processing effects with in-game fog.
  • New UI graphics.

Credits

Saran Tengtirasakul, 2021

MSU GEL LAB, 2020
